title: Registration Form
description:
Create a registration form with various input types and fieldsets.

## Requirements

1. Create a `<form>` with id="registration-form"

2. First `<fieldset>` with `<legend>` "Account Information":
   - Username: text input, id="username", required, minlength="3"
   - Password: password input, id="password", required, minlength="8"
   - Email: email input, id="email", required

3. Second `<fieldset>` with `<legend>` "Personal Details":
   - Date of Birth: date input, id="dob"
   - Country: select dropdown, id="country", with options:
     - "Select country" (value="", disabled, selected)
     - "United States" (value="us")
     - "Canada" (value="ca")
     - "United Kingdom" (value="uk")

4. Terms checkbox: id="terms", required, with label "I agree to the terms"

5. Submit button: "Create Account"

testCases.description: First fieldset should have legend "Account Information"
